sen.j: 大津港（おおつこう）は滋賀県にある港湾。
sen.e: Otsu Port is a port located in Shiga Prefecture.
Otsu Port is a port located in Shiga Prefecture.
Otsu Port is a port located in Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 湖面標高84mの琵琶湖に面する。
sen.e: It faces Lake Biwa of which altitude of the lake surface is 84 meters.
It faces Lake Biwa of which altitude of the lake surface is 84 meters.
It faces Lake Biwa of which altitude of the lake surface is 84 meters.

sen.j: 所在地は滋賀県大津市の浜大津。
sen.e: Its locations if Hamaotsu in Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture
It is located in Hamaotsu in Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture
sen.cmt: Its locations if → It is located in
sen.e: It is located in Hamaotsu in Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture

sen.j: かつては琵琶湖湖上水運の拠点として栄えた。
sen.e: It was flourished as a base for transportation by water Lake Biwa.
It was once flourished as a hub for waterway traffic on Lake Biwa.
It was once flourished as a hub for waterway traffic on Lake Biwa.

sen.j: 鉄道網の整備に伴い斜陽となった後は、遊覧船の発着拠点となっているほか、官公庁などが運航する各船の拠点にもなっている。
sen.e: After its decline because of improvement of the railway network, it has been used for departure and arrival of sightseeing ships as well as bases for various ships operated by governmental agencies.
After its decline because of improvement of the railway network, it has been used for departure and arrival of sightseeing ships as well as bases for various ships operated by governmental agencies.
After its decline because of improvement of the railway network, it has been used for departure and arrival of sightseeing ships as well as bases for various ships operated by governmental agencies.

sen.j: また、併設のマリーナや公園として整備された緑地など、多用途のレジャーに利用されている。
sen.e: It is also provided with an annexed marine and a green space developed as a park and used for multi-purpose leisure activities
It is also provided with an annexed marine and a green space developed as a park and used for a wide variety of leisure activities
It is also provided with an annexed marine and a green space developed as a park and used for a wide variety of leisure activities

sen.j: 施設は滋賀県が管理しているが、港湾施設などは琵琶湖汽船が、マリーナは関西メンテナンス滋賀が指定管理者となっている。
sen.e: Facilities are managed by Shiga Prefecture, but the designated manager for port facilities and so on is Biwako Kisen and, for the marina, Kansai Maintenance Shiga.
Facilities are managed by Shiga Prefecture, but the designated manager for port facilities and so on is Biwako Kisen and, for the marina, Kansai Maintenance Shiga.
Facilities are managed by Shiga Prefecture, but the designated manager for port facilities and so on is Biwako Kisen and, for the marina, Kansai Maintenance Shiga.

sen.j: - 大津京の主要港として整備され、湖上運送の拠点になる。
sen.e: It was established as a main port for Otsukyo and used as a base of transportation on the lake.
It was established as a main port for Otsukyo and used as a base of transportation on the lake.
It was established as a main port for Otsukyo and used as a base of transportation on the lake.

sen.j: 中世
sen.e: Medieval time
Medieval time
Medieval time

sen.j: - 平安京遷都により都の外港として栄える。
sen.e: Because of the transfer of national capital to the city of Heiankyo, it was flourished as an external port of the capital.
Because of the transfer of national capital to the city of Heiankyo, it was flourished as an outer harbor of the capital.
sen.cmt: 用語集に統一しました。external port → outer harbor
sen.e: Because of the transfer of national capital to the city of Heiankyo, it was flourished as an outer harbor of the capital.

sen.j: 豊臣秀吉により大津城が築かれ,大津港は水運の要衝として栄える。
sen.e: Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI built Otsu-jo Castle and Otsu Port was flourished as an important point for transportation by water.
Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI built Otsu-jo Castle and Otsu Port was flourished as an important point for waterway traffic.
Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI built Otsu-jo Castle and Otsu Port was flourished as an important point for waterway traffic.

sen.j: 翌年、秀吉の意向を受けた大津藩の浅野長吉が、湖岸諸藩の船を大津に集めた。
sen.e: Next year, Nagayoshi ASANO of Otsu domain collected ships of domains along the shore of the lake to Otsu in accordance with Hideyoshi's order.
Next year, Nagayoshi ASANO of Otsu domain collected ships of domains along the shore of the lake to Otsu in accordance with Hideyoshi's order.
Next year, Nagayoshi ASANO of Otsu domain collected ships of domains along the shore of the lake to Otsu in accordance with Hideyoshi's order.

sen.j: これが後に大津百艘船となり、大津港の荷役などに関する特権を代々の支配者から受けていた。
sen.e: This became Otsu Hyakusosen (literally, 100 ships of Otsu) later, and it was given privileges concerning cargo handling at Otsu Port and so on from rulers in each age.
This became Otsu Hyakusosen (literally, 100 ships of Otsu) later, and it was given privileges concerning cargo handling at Otsu Port and so on from rulers in each age.
This became Otsu Hyakusosen (literally, 100 ships of Otsu) later, and it was given privileges concerning cargo handling at Otsu Port and so on from rulers in each age.

sen.j: 近代
sen.e: Early-modern time
Early-modern time
Early-modern time

sen.j: - 日本初の湖上蒸気船「一番丸」が,大津-海津間に就航。
sen.e: The first steamship in lake in Japan "Ichibanmaru" went into service between Otsu and Kaizu.
The first steamship in lake in Japan 'Ichibanmaru' went into service between Otsu and Kaizu.
The first steamship in lake in Japan 'Ichibanmaru' went into service between Otsu and Kaizu.

sen.j: 大聖寺藩（大津汽船局）が運営した。
sen.e: It was operated by Daishoji domai (Osaka Kisenkyoku).
It was operated by Daishoji domain (Otsu Kisenkyoku [Otsu Steamship bureau]).
sen.cmt: スペル修正しました。[Otsu Steamship bureau]を補足しました。
sen.e: It was operated by Daishoji domain (Otsu Kisenkyoku [Otsu Steamship bureau]).

sen.j: 「一番丸」就航以降は様々な運営主体による汽船が就航し、大津百艘船も増加した。
sen.e: After "Ichibanmaru" went into service, steamships of various operators went into service and the number of water routes was also increased.
After 'Ichibanmaru' went into service, steamships of various operators went into service and the number of water routes was also increased.
After 'Ichibanmaru' went into service, steamships of various operators went into service and the number of water routes was also increased.

sen.j: また、南湖のローカル航路運営者や航路も暫時増加した。
sen.e: The number of operators and water routes for local routes in the southern part of the lake were also gradually increased.
The number of operators and water routes for local routes in the southern part of the lake were also gradually increased.
The number of operators and water routes for local routes in the southern part of the lake were also gradually increased.

sen.j: - 東海道本線が浜大津駅まで開通。
sen.e: Tokaido Main Line was opened up to Hamaotsu Station.
Tokaido Main Line was extended to Hamaotsu Station.
Tokaido Main Line was extended to Hamaotsu Station.

sen.j: 前年に鉄道が開通した長浜駅との間で鉄道連絡船を開始。
sen.e: Operation of railway ferry to Nagahama Station, to which railway went into service in the preceding year, was commenced.
Operation of railway ferry to Nagahama Station, to which railway went into service in the preceding year, was commenced.
Operation of railway ferry to Nagahama Station, to which railway went into service in the preceding year, was commenced.

sen.j: - 東海道線が全通。
sen.e: Whole Tokaido Line went into service.
Whole Tokaido Main Line went into service.
sen.cmt: 用語集に統一しました。
sen.e: Whole Tokaido Main Line went into service.

sen.j: 鉄道網整備の進展とともに、湖上運送が衰退する。
sen.e: In line with progress of development of railway network, transportation by lake declined.
Along with progress of development of railway network, transportation by lake declined.
Along with progress of development of railway network, transportation by lake declined.

sen.j: - 湖上定期遊覧船が就航、湖上観光び拠点港として復興する。
sen.e: Regular service of excursion boats was commenced and the port was restored as a base for sightseeing on the lake.
sen.cmt: 原文に不備があり（Wikipediaでも同様です）、訳文も不完全なものになりました。
sen.e: Regular service of excursion boats was commenced and the port was restored as a base for sightseeing on the lake.
Regular service of excursion boats was commenced and the port was restored as a base for sightseeing on the lake.

sen.j: - 玻璃丸が就航する。
sen.e: Harimaru went into service.
Harimaru went into service.
Harimaru went into service.

sen.j: - ミシガンが就航する。
sen.e: Michigan went into service
Michigan went into service
Michigan went into service
